revised_title: The Electron Microscopy and Composition of Biological Membranes and Envelopes: A Review
tldr: This article discusses the structure, function, and composition of biological membranes and envelopes. It highlights the importance of understanding membrane dynamics, differentiation, and transport mechanisms. The author also explores complex envelopes, their formation, and the genetic control of their development.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
